snippet: The New York Cosmos of the North American Soccer League want to build a soccer stadium as part of a larger development at Belmont Park Race Track.
lead_paragraph: The New York Cosmos of the North American Soccer League want to build a soccer stadium as part of a larger development at Belmont Park Race Track.

headline.seo: Cosmos Unveil Plan for Soccer Stadium Near Belmont Park
headline.main: Cosmos Unveil Plan for Soccer Stadium Near Belmont Park
headline.print_headline: Cosmos Unveil Plan for Soccer Stadium Near Belmont Park
